intro: Psychotria globulosobaccata, commonly known as the globular capsule psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and produces clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. Its fruit is a globose, fleshy capsule that contains several seeds. Psychotria globulosobaccata is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical rainforests.
